alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Grady; Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:13AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Washita, northern Grady, Caddo, southern Custer, Kiowa, southwestern Blaine, southwestern Canadian and northeastern Beckham Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 312 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles north of Cogar to near Alfalfa to 4 miles north of Lone Wolf. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Weatherford, Clinton, Anadarko, Hobart, Cordell, Tuttle, Hinton, Burns Flat, Carnegie, Union City, Minco, Geary, Hydro, Sentinel, Arapaho, Mountain View, Binger, Fort Cobb, and Dill City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 37 and 114. Interstate 44 between mile markers 90 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Grady; Kiowa; Washita
